response.content:
Hi Markus, the course is about to create an accessible website step by step with Twenty Nineteen theme. So the steps to get the domain and the hosting are included in the course. I wrote this on the description of the course too. 

I also wrote in the course's description, that if you already have the domain and hosting, you can still follow the course, by skipping those steps. 

Nonetheless, thank you so much for joining the course, and leaving this feedback. Much appreciated.

Kim.
